languages.text: {n}Вы окидываете края пролома внимательным взглядом и через пару минут приходите к выводу, что потолок лаборатории был пробит мощными направленными взрывами. Потратив еще немного времени, вы замечаете характерные следы на обломках и стенах: пролом был сделан с помощью мельта-зарядов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы окидываете края пролома внимательным взглядом и через пару минут приходите к выводу, что потолок лаборатории был пробит мощными направленными взрывами. Потратив еще немного времени, вы замечаете характерные следы на обломках и стенах: пролом был сделан с помощью мельта-зарядов.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You study the edges of the breach carefully, reflect for a few minutes, and conclude that the hole in the lab ceiling was created by several powerful targeted explosions. After some more time, you note the characteristic marks on the debris and the walls. The ceiling was breached using melta charges.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы окидываете края пролома внимательным взглядом и через пару минут приходите к выводу, что потолок лаборатории был пробит мощными направленными взрывами. Потратив еще немного времени, вы замечаете характерные следы на обломках и стенах: пролом был сделан с помощью мельта-зарядов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You study the edges of the breach carefully, reflect for a few minutes, and conclude that the hole in the laboratory ceiling was blown by several powerful directed explosions. After some more time, you note the characteristic marks on the debris and the walls. The ceiling was breached using melta charges.{/n}

After some more time, you note the characteristic marks on the debris and the walls. The ceiling was breached using melta charges.{/n}

After some more time, you note the characteristic marks on the debris and the walls. The ceiling was breached using melta charges.{/n}

{n}You study the edges of the breach carefully, reflect for a few minutes, and conclude that the hole in the lab ceiling was created by several powerful targeted explosions. After some more time, you note the characteristic marks on the debris and the walls. The ceiling was breached using melta charges.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你仔细研究着天花板缺口的边缘，思索了几分钟，得出了结论——实验室天花板的大洞是被好几次威力强大的定向爆炸炸毁的。你又观察了一会儿，注意到地上的碎片与墙壁上留下的热熔印记。这些大洞应该是用热熔炸药炸出来的。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You study the edges of the breach carefully, reflect for a few minutes, and conclude that the hole in the lab ceiling was created by several powerful targeted explosions. After some more time, you note the characteristic marks on the debris and the walls. The ceiling was breached using melta charges.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你仔细研究着天花板缺口的边缘，思索了几分钟，得出了结论——实验室天花板的大洞是被好几次威力强大的定向爆炸炸毁的。你又观察了一会儿，注意到地上的碎片与墙壁上留下的热熔印记。这些大洞应该是用热熔炸药炸出来的。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du studierst sorgfältig die Ränder des Lochs, denkst einige Minuten lang nach und kommst zu dem Schluss, dass das Loch in der Labordecke durch mehrere zielgerichtete und starke Explosionen entstanden ist. Nach einiger Zeit bemerkst du die charakteristischen Spuren auf dem Schutt und an den Wänden. Die Decke wurde mit Hilfe von Melterladungen gesprengt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You study the edges of the breach carefully, reflect for a few minutes, and conclude that the hole in the lab ceiling was created by several powerful targeted explosions. After some more time, you note the characteristic marks on the debris and the walls. The ceiling was breached using melta charges.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du studierst sorgfältig die Ränder des Lochs, denkst einige Minuten lang nach und kommst zu dem Schluss, dass das Loch in der Labordecke durch mehrere zielgerichtete und starke Explosionen entstanden ist. Nach einiger Zeit bemerkst du die charakteristischen Spuren auf dem Schutt und an den Wänden. Die Decke wurde mit Hilfe von Melterladungen gesprengt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Inspeccionas detenidamente los bordes del agujero, reflexionas durante unos minutos y concluyes que el techo del laboratorio cedió a consecuencia de varias detonaciones potentes y deliberadas. Luego te fijas en las marcas delatoras que hay en los restos y las paredes. Se usaron cargas de fusión para reventar el techo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You study the edges of the breach carefully, reflect for a few minutes, and conclude that the hole in the lab ceiling was created by several powerful targeted explosions. After some more time, you note the characteristic marks on the debris and the walls. The ceiling was breached using melta charges.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Inspeccionas detenidamente los bordes del agujero, reflexionas durante unos minutos y concluyes que el techo del laboratorio cedió a consecuencia de varias detonaciones bastante potentes y deliberadas. Luego te fijas en las marcas delatoras que hay en los restos y las paredes. Se usaron cargas de fusión para reventar el techo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous étudiez attentivement les bords de la brèche puis, après quelques minutes de réflexion, en venez à la conclusion que le plafond a été pulvérisé par plusieurs puissantes explosions ciblées. Au bout de quelques instants de plus, vous remarquez des marques caractéristiques sur les débris et les murs. Cette dévastation est l'œuvre de charges à fusion.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You study the edges of the breach carefully, reflect for a few minutes, and conclude that the hole in the lab ceiling was created by several powerful targeted explosions. After some more time, you note the characteristic marks on the debris and the walls. The ceiling was breached using melta charges.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous étudiez attentivement les bords de la brèche puis, après quelques minutes de réflexion, en venez à la conclusion que le plafond a été pulvérisé par plusieurs puissantes explosions ciblées. Au bout de quelques instants de plus, vous remarquez des marques caractéristiques sur les débris et les murs. Cette dévastation est l'œuvre de charges à fusion.{/n}

languages.text: {n}数分間、裂け目の端を注意深く観察する。そして研究室の天井に空いた穴は強力な指向性爆発が数回起こってできたものだと結論づけた。さらにしばらくすると、あなたは破片と壁に特徴的な跡があることに気づいた。天井はメルタ爆薬で破られたのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You study the edges of the breach carefully, reflect for a few minutes, and conclude that the hole in the lab ceiling was created by several powerful targeted explosions. After some more time, you note the characteristic marks on the debris and the walls. The ceiling was breached using melta charges.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}数分間、裂け目の端を注意深く観察する。そして研究室の天井に空いた穴は強力な指向性爆発が数回起こってできたものだと結論づけた。さらにしばらくすると、あなたは破片と壁に特徴的な跡があることに気づいた。天井はメルタ爆薬で破られたのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deliğin kenarlarını dikkatle inceleyip birkaç dakikalığına düşünüyorsun. Sonunda, laboratuvar tavanının birden fazla hedefli patlama sonucu delindiği kanısına varıyorsun. Bir süre sonra yıkıntı ve duvarlardaki karakteristik izleri fark ediyorsun. Bu tavan, melta bombalarıyla delinmiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You study the edges of the breach carefully, reflect for a few minutes, and conclude that the hole in the lab ceiling was created by several powerful targeted explosions. After some more time, you note the characteristic marks on the debris and the walls. The ceiling was breached using melta charges.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deliğin kenarlarını dikkatle inceleyip birkaç dakikalığına düşünüyorsun. Sonunda, laboratuvar tavanının birden fazla hedefli patlama sonucu delindiği kanısına varıyorsun. Bir süre sonra yıkıntı ve duvarlardaki karakteristik izleri fark ediyorsun. Bu tavan, melta bombalarıyla delinmiş.{/n}
